full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SHING RTA'I SROL 'BYED KYI RNAM GZHAG RIGS PA'I RI BO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @022B CES SHING RTA'I SROL 'BYED KYI RNAM GZHAG RIN CHEN RIGS PA'I RI BO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DUS GSUM RGYAL BA KUN GYI NGO BO DKYIL 'KHOR RGYA MTSO'I MNGA' BDAG SKYABS MGON RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO NAS RANG CAG BLANG DOR GYI GNAS LA MGRON PO PHYOGS SLAD PA BZHIN DU GYUR BA RNAMS LA THUGS BRTZE BAS NYE BAR DGONGS TE TSUGS PAR MDZAD PA'I GRVA TSANG RIN PO CHE THEG CHEN BSHAD SGRUB GLING GI GZHUNG GSAR BA'I 'DZIN GRVA'I BLO GSAR BA 'GA' ZHIG GIS, ,SHING RTA'I SROL 'BYED KYI DPE CHA MI MTHUN PA MANG PO YOD PA'I STABS KYIS KHAS BLANGS 'DZIN BDE BA MI 'DUG PAS PHYOGS GCIG PA ZHIG 'BRI DGOS ZHES PA'I NGO BZLOG MA NUS PAR, ,RAB 'BYAMS PA 'JAM DPAL GZHON NUS KHAS LEN SNGA MA'I RGYUN 'DZIN PA DANG RTZOD PA 'PHEL BA'I PHYIR DU CUD MI 'DRA BA BYAS BTZAM MA GTOGS, ,MKHAS PA CHEN PO AA KY'A YONGS 'DZIN GYIS MDZAD PA'I SHING RTA'I SROL 'BYED KYI RNAM GZHAG LA GZHIR BYAS NAS BRIS PA @023A *, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA KUN RGYAL BA'I DAM CHOS MA LUS PA 'DZIN PA'I RGYU KHO NA BYED PAR GYUR CIG GU ,AOm SVA STI, ,RNAM GROL BSHAD SGRUB RIN CHEN 'BYUNG GNAS MCHOG ,RNAM 'DREN RJE BTZUN DAM PA'I GDAN SA CHER, ,RNAM MANG 'GRO LA CHOS SBYIN SPEL PHYIR DU, ,RNAM DAG PAR GYI 'PHRUL BZANG DENG 'DIR BSGRUBS, ,DGE'O, ,
